heading: HR00772
0: A RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO CREATE A BOARD/COMMITTEE TO STUDY, RECOMMEND AND DRAFT A NATIONAL POLICY PROGRAM TO COMBAT THE PROLIFERATION OF ILLEGAL DRUGS COMPOSED OF MEMBERS OF THE ADMINISTRATION, OPPOSITION, AND INDEPENDENT SCIENTISTS, SOCIOLOGISTS, AND OTHER EXPERTS
status: Pending with the Committee on DANGEROUS DRUGS since 2017-02-15

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00772
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE TO CREATE A BOARD/COMMITTEE TO STUDY, RECOMMEND AND DRAFT A NATIONAL POLICY PROGRAM TO COMBAT THE PROLIFERATION OF ILLEGAL DRUGS COMPOSED OF MEMBERS OF THE ADMINISTRATION, OPPOSITION, AND INDEPENDENT SCIENTISTS, SOCIOLOGISTS, AND OTHER EXPERTS
